## Description {#details}

This file defines the implementation for the loop cache analysis.

The implementation is largely based on the following paper: <CodeBlock>  Compiler Optimizations for Improving Data Locality
  By: Steve Carr, Katherine S. McKinley, Chau-Wen Tseng
  http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/mckinley/papers/asplos-1994.pdf
</CodeBlock>

The general approach taken to estimate the number of cache lines used by the memory references in an inner loop is:
<ul>
<li>Partition memory references that exhibit temporal or spacial reuse into reference groups.</li>
<li>For each loop L in the a loop nest LN: a. Compute the cost of the reference group b. Compute the loop cost by summing up the reference groups costs</li>
</ul>

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### computeTripCount() {#a605f4ae007c6b19244c175eb1990abc1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static const SCEV &#42; computeTripCount (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &amp; ElemSize, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Compute the trip count for the given loop <code>L</code> or assume a default value if it is not a compile time constant.

Return the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression for the trip count.

Definition at line <a href="#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getInnerMostLoop() {#a8b3e30ba3a19f0debefc124b3682a1a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Loop &#42; getInnerMostLoop (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74fccdd55e3793730ca5fd831595b16d">LoopVectorTy</a> &amp; Loops)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Retrieve the innermost loop in the given loop nest <code>Loops</code>.

It returns a nullptr if any loops in the loop vector supplied has more than one sibling. The loop vector is expected to contain loops collected in breadth-first order.

Definition at line <a href="#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the indexed reference is loop invariant the cost is one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isLoopInvariant(L)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Reference is loop invariant: RefCost=1\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;TripCount = <a href="#a605f4ae007c6b19244c175eb1990abc1">computeTripCount</a>(L, &#42;Sizes.back(), SE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TripCount &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting valid TripCount&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;TripCount=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;TripCount &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;RefCost = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Stride = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isConsecutive(L, Stride, CLS)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the indexed reference is &#39;consecutive&#39; the cost is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (TripCount&#42;Stride)/CLS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Stride != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Stride should not be null for consecutive access!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;WiderType = SE.getWiderType(Stride-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), TripCount-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a> = SE.getConstant(WiderType, CLS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stride = SE.getNoopOrAnyExtend(Stride, WiderType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">    TripCount = SE.getNoopOrZeroExtend(TripCount, WiderType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Numerator = SE.getMulExpr(Stride, TripCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round the fractional cost up to the nearest integer number.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The impact is the most significant when cost is calculated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be a number less than one, because it makes more sense</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to say one cache line is used rather than zero cache line</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">    RefCost = SE.getUDivCeilSCEV(Numerator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">               &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Access is consecutive: RefCost=(TripCount&#42;Stride)/CLS=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">               &lt;&lt; &#42;RefCost &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the indexed reference is not &#39;consecutive&#39; the cost is proportional to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the trip count and the depth of the dimension which the subject loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subscript is accessing. We try to estimate this by multiplying the cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by the trip counts of loops corresponding to the inner dimensions. For</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// example, given the indexed reference &#39;A&#91;i&#93;&#91;j&#93;&#91;k&#93;&#39;, and assuming the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i-loop is in the innermost position, the cost would be equal to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iterations of the i-loop multiplied by iterations of the j-loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">    RefCost = TripCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = getSubscriptIndex(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Index &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Could not locate a valid Index&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Index + 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#aef3d54c9ec716d007cb7ba0b2deab8b5">getNumSubscripts</a>() - 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;AR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#a06a4b381bd3760668fd5b5e3c42bc1c3">getSubscript</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(AR &amp;&amp; AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting valid loop&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;TripCount =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="#a605f4ae007c6b19244c175eb1990abc1">computeTripCount</a>(&#42;AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>(), &#42;Sizes.back(), SE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;WiderType = SE.getWiderType(RefCost-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), TripCount-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the multiplication result to fit, request a type twice as wide.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">      WiderType = WiderType-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac59306eb826e349ac7429736b1506432">getExtendedType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">      RefCost = SE.getMulExpr(SE.getNoopOrZeroExtend(RefCost, WiderType),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">                              SE.getNoopOrZeroExtend(TripCount, WiderType));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">               &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Access is not consecutive: RefCost=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;RefCost &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RefCost &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting a valid RefCost&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Attempt to fold RefCost into a constant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CacheCostTy is a signed integer, but the tripcount value can be large</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and may not fit, so saturate/limit the value to the maximum signed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// integer value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ConstantCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(RefCost))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ConstantCost-&gt;getValue()-&gt;getLimitedValue(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">             &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;RefCost is not a constant! Setting to RefCost=InvalidCost &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;(invalid value).\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a57207993e2fe6ec98912e8072e4600bc">CacheCostTy::getInvalid</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IndexedReference::tryDelinearizeFixedSize(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;AccessFn, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const SCEV &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Subscripts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 4&gt;</a> ArraySizes;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the loop induction variable is the last one...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCEV &#42;LastSubscript = Subscripts.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCEV &#42;Subscript : Subscripts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Subscript == LastSubscript)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!isCoeffForLoopZeroOrInvariant(&#42;Subscript, L))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...and the access stride is less than the cache line size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCEV &#42;Coeff = getLastCoefficient();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCEV &#42;ElemSize = Sizes.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;WiderType = SE.getWiderType(Coeff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), ElemSize-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This assumes that all values are signed integers which may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be incorrect in unusual codes and incorrectly use sext instead of zext.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for (uint32&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; 512; ++i) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   uint8&#95;t trunc = i;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   A&#91;trunc&#93; = 42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This consecutively iterates twice over A. If &#96;trunc&#96; is sign-extended,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we would conclude that this may iterate backwards over the array.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, LoopCacheAnalysis is heuristic anyway and transformations must</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not result in wrong optimizations if the heuristic was incorrect.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">  Stride = SE.getMulExpr(SE.getNoopOrSignExtend(Coeff, WiderType),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">                         SE.getNoopOrSignExtend(ElemSize, WiderType));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCEV &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a> = SE.getConstant(Stride-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), CLS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">  Stride = SE.isKnownNegative(Stride) ? SE.getNegativeSCEV(Stride) : Stride;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SE.isKnownPredicate(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba91d86a4753c8bd7624e01bf565d87f8e">ICmpInst::ICMP&#95;ULT</a>, Stride, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L : Loops) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TripCount = SE.getSmallConstantTripCount(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">    TripCount = (TripCount == 0) ? <a href="#aed354954ff68154d1ca7f088d95a8a53">DefaultTripCount</a> : TripCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">    TripCounts.push&#95;back(&#123;L, TripCount&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">  calculateCacheFootprint();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Both positive and negative access functions will be placed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into the same reference group, resulting in a bi-directional array</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// access such as:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   for (i = N; i &gt; 0; i--)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     A&#91;i&#93; = A&#91;N - i&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// having the same cost calculation as a single dimention access pattern</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   for (i = 0; i &lt; N; i++)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     A&#91;i&#93; = A&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when in actuality, depending on the array size, the first example</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// should have a cost closer to 2x the second due to the two cache</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// access per iteration from opposite ends of the array</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::optional&lt;bool&gt; HasTemporalReuse =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;hasTemporalReuse(Representative, &#42;TRT, &#42;InnerMostLoop, DI, AA);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::optional&lt;bool&gt; HasSpacialReuse =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;hasSpacialReuse(Representative, CLS, AA);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((HasTemporalReuse &amp;&amp; &#42;HasTemporalReuse) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">            (HasSpacialReuse &amp;&amp; &#42;HasSpacialReuse)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">          RefGroup.push&#95;back(std::move(R));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a2f63e339cd88f5a8e97a8150ea9129d2af29ddbfb905eb2593fdcdfb243f9af85">Added</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> &amp;RG : RefGroups) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
